snippet.title: Airplane - A top down shooter - Trailer #shorts
snippet.description:
Airplane is a top down shooter made by suIly, an indie game developer. 


Airplane, the best indie shooter!

From the makers of Space 2 comes this insane, high flying top down shooter that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Download FREE now to start a new game and start blasting away.

INSTRUCTIONS:

⚡Tap to shoot
⚡Eliminate enemies before they eliminate you
⚡Collect powerups and upgrade boxes to clear enemy ranks
⚡Customize your airplane with different upgrades
⚡Equip high-tech gadgets and power-ups
⚡Test your reflexes with simple one-touch controls

FEATURES:

⚡ Awesome handcrafted skins
⚡ Four awesome epic worlds
⚡ High-tech gadgets and powerups
⚡Dodge birds, asteroids, and feesh
⚡Awesome and original 10/10 gameplay

This game is THE BEST high tech top down indie shooter out there. Made with love by Sully, a 15 year old indie game developer, you won't regret a thing downloading this app.Get it here: https://sullystudios.itch.io/airplane
and also on google play:
